resources.description: These principal indicators cover the core activities of the Publications Office from 2006 to 2015 and fall into the following categories: access to law, reuse, public procurement, and publications and dissemination. The indicators take also into account administrative and operating budgets.
resources.name: Principal indicators of the Publications Office’s activity from 2006 to 2015

resources.description:
The dataset contains information on the activity of the Publications Office of the European Union in 2015, based on its Annual Management Report (AMR). It provides an insight on the Office’s main achievements over the year and a summary of the Office’s activities, namely for the production, the access to, the reuse as well as the long-term preservation of public information of the EU institutions, including the management of public websites such as EUR-Lex, EU Open Data Portal, TED, CORDIS, EU Bookshop, EU Whoiswho.

The report is addressed to all the EU institutions and it is established annually by the Publications Office’s Management Committee, who is also responsible for its strategic guidelines.

The report is available in English and must be published by 1 May each year.

The Publications Office of the European Union is an interinstitutional office. Its organisation and operation are governed by Decision 2009/496/EC, Euratom, as amended by Decision 2012/368/EU, Euratom.
resources.name: Annual Management Report 2015 of the Publications Office

resources.description: Decision 2009/496/EC, Euratom of the European Parliament, the Council, the Commission, the Court of Justice, the Court of Auditors, the European Economic and Social Committee and the Committee of the Regions of 26 June 2009 on the organisation and operation of the Publications Office of the European Union
resources.name: Decision 2009/496/EC, Euratom of the European Parliament, the Council, the Commission, the Court of Justice, the Court of Auditors, the European Economic and Social Committee and the Committee of the Regions of 26 June 2009 on the organisation and operation of the Publications Office of the European Union

resources.description: Decision of the European Parliament, the Council, the Commission, the Court of Justice of the European Union, the Court of Auditors, the European Economic and Social Committee and the Committee of the Regions of 29 June 2012 amending Decision 2009/496/EC, Euratom on the organisation and operation of the Publications Office of the European Union
resources.name: Decision of the European Parliament, the Council, the Commission, the Court of Justice of the European Union, the Court of Auditors, the European Economic and Social Committee and the Committee of the Regions of 29 June 2012 amending Decision 2009/496/EC, Euratom on the organisation and operation of the Publications Office of the European Union
